laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.title: Commercial Code
laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.description: This law governs commercial activities and the formation of companies in Morocco.

laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.title: Company Law
laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.description: This law outlines the legal framework for creating and operating public limited companies (Société Anonyme) in Morocco.

laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.title: Limited Liability Companies
laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.description: This law governs the formation and operation of limited liability companies (SARL) in Morocco.

laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.title: Auto-Entrepreneur Status
laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.description: This law establishes the legal framework for self-employed individuals (auto-entrepreneurs) in Morocco.

laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.title: Insolvency Law
laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.description: This law provides the legal framework for insolvency proceedings and the protection of creditors' rights.

laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.title: Startups Act
laws_in_morocco_about_startups_and_enter.description: This law aims to support the creation and development of startups in Morocco through various incentives and support mechanisms.
